movies.name: Titanic
movies.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.name: Rocky
movies.actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
movies.plot: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
